channel.title: Making a server...help!
channel.description:
i did everything be4 it and i clicked the run and all it did was some words and press any key to continue and none of this ever showed up
Step 5 So now you have a server extracted and ready to use. But when you start it you get a weird error.
Can Not Find Specified Location Device is not ready javac is not reconized To fix this we need to edit two files.
Edit Compile.bat and replace the text inside it with:
Code: @echo off title yourservernamehere "C:Program FilesJavajdk1.5.0_09injavac.exe" -cp . *.java "C:Program FilesJavajdk1.5.0_09injava.exe" server pause Edit Runserver.bat and replace the text inside it with:
Code: @echo off title yourservernamehere java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server
HELP ME AND YOU MIGHT GET ADMIN OR P MOD [br][size=1]Posted at: November 25, 2006, 09:06:12 AM[/size][hr] ;D :o :confused: :( :mad:

item.title: Making a server...help!
item.dc:creator: @Mrquarter Mrquarter
item.description:
@Mrquarter wrote:

first download java put www.java.com download it…and in your runserver put

@echo off title YOURSERVERNAMEHERE java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server

andthis 4 compile

@echo off title YOURSERVERNAMHERE Compiler "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_09\bin\javac" *.java pause

item.title: Making a server...help!
item.dc:creator: @_AlexOwnz ?AlexOwnz?
item.description:
@_AlexOwnz wrote:

i did everything be4 it and i clicked the run and all it did was some words and press any key to continue and none of this ever showed up

Step 5
So now you have a server extracted and ready to use. But when you start it you get a weird error.

Can Not Find Specified Location
Device is not ready
javac is not reconized
To fix this we need to edit two files.

Edit Compile.bat and replace the text inside it with:

Code:
@echo off
title yourservernamehere
“C:Program FilesJavajdk1.5.0_09injavac.exe” -cp . *.java
“C:Program FilesJavajdk1.5.0_09injava.exe” server
pause
Edit Runserver.bat and replace the text inside it with:

Code:
@echo off
title yourservernamehere
java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server

HELP ME AND YOU MIGHT GET ADMIN OR P MOD
[br][size=1]Posted at: November 25, 2006, 09:06:12 AM[/size][hr] ;D :o :mad:

Read full topic
